name: empty_texture
msg: Texture format and dimensions have zero size

name: invalid_layer_count
msg: Layer count must be in the range [ 1, 65535 ]

name: invalid_face_count
msg: Face count must be in the range [ 1, 255 ]

name: invalid_level_count
msg: Mipmap level count must be in the range [ 1, 255 ]
